description:
Geoff has been married for about 10 years.
"She's really patient with me," he said. "I think that's why we get along."
Geoff has been trying to get into the modeling business. That's actually how we met. I have a friend who works for a "conventional" agency who sends me guys (here and there) who he thinks might be interested in "crossing over."
"Does your wife know why you're here?" I asked. I know I shouldn't, but sometimes I can't resist.
"No," he replied.
Apparently, Geoff travels a lot for his job (he's in sales) and for the occasional modeling gig.
I guess that makes for a good cover!
title: Geoff
